title: NFC is reading really slow...
content:
I have problems with using NFC, where it reads the tag only after a minute or more (painfully slow)...
When I put it down on a tag, it takes a bit of time before it reads the tag (1 or 2 min)...
I installed "NFC Tools" which is an easy app to test...

What can I do to fix this problem? Because I really need it for development.
The first question youre probably going to ask is what case I use arround the device (this is the pixel official case) and removing this case doesn't help...

PS: I tried to report on the pixel support app, but it keeps crashing when I try to start it...
